attachments.title: Pepsi pull offensive Kendall Jenner ad after global outrage
attachments.text: Pepsi has bowed to pressure and is “pulling” its controversial advert featuring Kendall Jenner at a protest. The video has been removed from YouTube and in a statement, the company said: "Pepsi was trying to project a global a message of unity, peace and understanding. "Clearly, we missed the mark, and we apologise. We did not intend to make light of any serious issue.
attachments.fallback: The Independent: Pepsi pull offensive Kendall Jenner ad after global outrage
